body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     Places               Places      Prehistoric archaeological sites, historic architecture, and historic engineering and industrial sites are all abundant in the Upper Delaware Valley.Portions of the D & H Canal, including the Delaware Aqueduct, were designated a National Historic Landmark in 1968. The Delaware Aqueduct is also designated a National Civil Engineering Landmark.  Â     The Corwin Farm, a canal era farmstead, is now a National Park Service ranger station. National Park Service
title: Upper Delaware Scenic & Recreational River: Places
